# Wireless Bluetooth Ski Helmet Speakers

Item # 203379

$129.99$103.99 with code WONDER

Item is sold out and is no longer available

20% off sitewide + free shipping with rebate. Promo code: WONDER

Enjoy your favorite tunes and take calls on the slopes! Wireless Bluetooth Ski
Helmet Speakers pair easily with any Bluetooth-enabled device and work with
any ski or snowboard helmet that has a sleeve for an ear piece. Simply press a
button on the headphones for all functions: volume, play/pause and answer/hang
up. They're sweat- and water-resistant, and give you up to 10 hours of run
time on a full charge. Compatible with all iPhones, iPads, Samsung Galaxies
and all other Android devices. Includes carry pouch. See Features tab below
for a list of compatible helmets.

See more details

FeaturesSpecificationsReviewsInstructions

#### Wireless Bluetooth Ski Helmet Speakers

Wireless Bluetooth Ski Helmet Speakers are simple to use, pair easily with any
Bluetooth-enabled device and work in any helmet that has a sleeve for an ear
piece.

• Connects to any Bluetooth-enabled device with easy, one-touch pairing.
(Compatible with all iPhones, iPads, Samsung Galaxies and all other Android
devices. Also compatible with Bluetooth-enabled MP3 players such as iPod touch
2nd gen and newer and iPod nano 7th gen and newer)

• Rechargeable lithium-ion battery

• Patented 2-button control system allows you to adjust volume, change tracks,
play/pause music and answer calls from outside your helmet without removing
your gloves

• Rugged, minimal design fits into virtually any helmet designed to take audio
drop-ins

• IPX4 sweat- and water-resistant

• Reconnects automatically to previously paired device

• Play time: 9-10 hours

• Standby time: 280 hours

• Bluetooth Profiles: A2DP for high-quality stereo sound streaming and AVCRP
to control track and volume remotely

• Wireless range: up to 30 feet

• Size: 2" x 2" x .5"

• Tested to work perfectly at -20° C/-4° F

• Weight: 0.18 lbs.

• Driver size: 40mm

• Max volume: 120 decibels

• Includes USB charging cable, backup audio line-in cable with controls, carry
pouch and instruction manual

• Helmet not included

NOTE: Your helmet or helmet liner must have slots for audio drop-ins

• Compatible with newer models of these helmet brands with an audio-ready
liner:

\- Bern

\- Anon

\- Giro

\- Smith Optics

\- POC

\- Pro-Tec

\- Solomon

\- Bolle

Length: 2 Inches

Width: 4 Inches

Height: 0.5 Inches

Weight: 0.13 Lbs

Please click here for the product manual.
